title: error by sharing a file with link
body:
### expected behaviour
when sharing with a link a file, a mail should be shown to the selected user

### actual behaviour
there is an error: "error while sharing   smtp error: the folllowing recipients failed"
although the alert message is shown, the "shared" icon is set on the file, by refreshing the web, it disappears

### steps to reproduce
1. select one file, share with link
2. check password protect
3. enter the password
4. enter the user mail
5. click send
6. error

### server configuration
acceptance-testing master_on_apache_with_sqlite
